Author: piizza
Text: I promise it is water weight! It can take a week for me to lose my water weight again, ESPECIALLY if I am neglecting to stay hydrated (water AND electrolytes). Drink up and maybe take a light walk to calm yourself. Believe me, I know how scary it is to see that jump on the scale. You'll be okay. :)
